ComicInfo.Summary:
"Snowblower Indemnity," Part Four-The hottest party around is in full swing, and Ernie's on the guest list! With Sister Mary there to keep him on track and Scorpionus agents in sight, what's the worst that could happen? Dress is optional - scumbaggery is guaranteed.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------------------------|--------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Roland Boschi & Moreno DiNisio | 1 | | B | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover B | Duncan Fegredo | 2 |
ComicInfo.Tags: Ernie Ray Clementine,Sister Mary,Madam Hive,Moonflower,Pam,Ultra-Nationalist,The Moon,Prosoma
ComicInfo.Title: Snowblower Indemnity, Part Four
